body:
hi devang,  no i did not try native timer component. but i see what you mean. the issue is the time for each run varies between 3-5 mins until it reachs 20-25 mins a run depending on the number of zones and how long has the PC been running.  so i can't fix by setting a time for each run. 

i think the main key is to have some output from "read annual results that can freeze the running of energy sim until it finishes doing the schedules  -anas
